Armament.name: The Darksaber
Armament.description:
You gain Dauntless (After you rally, if you are suppressed but not panicked, you may gain 1 suppression token to perform a free move action.)

While defending against a melee attack, you gain Immune: Pierce.

Command.name: Commanding Presence
Command.description: When issuing orders, you can issue orders at range 4.

Command.name: Esteemed Leader
Command.description: While you are defending, each friendly corps trooper unit at range 1 gains GUARDIAN 1 (When a friendly unit at range 1 is defending against a ranged attack, you may choose 1 [hit] result. For each result chosen, roll a defense die as though you were the defender.)

Command.name: Improvised Orders
Command.description: After an order token is drawn from your order pool, you may draw a second order token, choose 1 to use and shuffle the other back into your order pool. During the End Phase, ready this card, if able.

Command.name: Strict Orders
Command.description: When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its Rally step, it may remove 1 suppression token instead of rolling dice.

Command.name: Aggressive Tactics
Command.description: While you are the nominated commander, after issuing orders, choose up to 4 friendly units with faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

Comms.name: Comms Jammer
Comms.description: Enemy units at range 1 cannot be issued orders, unless they are issuing an order to themselves.

Comms.name: Long-Range Comlink
Comms.description: During the Command Phase, you can be issued orders by friendly commander or operative units regardless of range.

Comms.name: HQ Uplink
Comms.description: During the Issue Orders Step of the Command Phase, issue an order to yourself.

Comms.name: Comms Relay
Comms.description: When you would be issued an order, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2. Issue an order to the chosen unit instead.

Elite.name: Duck and Cover
Elite.description: While defending against a ranged attack, during the Apply Dodge and Cover step, you may gain 1 suppression token.

Elite.name: Hunter
Elite.description: While attacking a wounded trooper unit, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may gain 1 aim token.

Elite.name: Tenacity
Elite.description: While performing a melee attack, if you are wounded or if one or more of your minis have been defeated, add 1 red attack die to your attack pool.

Elite.name: Overwatch
Elite.description: You gain Sentinel. (Your standby range is 1-3.)

Elite.name: Endurance
Elite.description: At the end of the Activation phase, you may remove 1 suppression token.

Force.name: Battle Meditation
Force.description: While you are issuing orders using a command card, you may issue 1 of those orders to any friendly unit on the battlefeld, instead of a unit indicated on the command card.

Force.name: Force Choke
Force.description:
Dark side only.

[card action] Choose a non-commander non-operative trooper mini at range 1.  It suffers 1 wound.

Force.name: Force Push
Force.description: [action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1. Perform a speed-1 move with that unit, even if it is engaged.

Force.name: Saber Throw
Force.description: [action] Choose 1 of your melee weapons. Perform a ranged attack with the weapon against an enemy unit at range 1-2, using half of that weapon's dice, rounded up. This is treated as an attack action.

Force.name: Jedi Mind Trick
Force.description: Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1-2. It gains 2 suppression tokens.

Force.name: Anger
Force.description: After you suffer 1 or more wounds, gain 1 aim token.

Force.name: Hope
Force.description:
Light Side only.

You gain Inspire 1 (After your rally step, remove up to 1 suppression token from another friendly unit at range 1-2.)

Force.name: Force Guidance
Force.description: Choose up to 2 friendly units at range 1-2. Each chosen unit gains 1 surge token.

Force.name: Fear
Force.description: You gain Demoralize 1 (After your Rally step, an enemy unit range 1-2 gains up to 1 suppression token.)

keywords.name: You gain EXPERT CLIMBER
keywords.description: While clambering, do not roll defense dice or suffer wounds.

keywords.name: You gain PRECISE 1
keywords.description: When you spend an aim token, reroll up to 1 additional die.

keywords.name: You gain UNHINDERED
keywords.description: You ignore the effects of difficult terrain.

During an attack, when you would suffer wounds, prevent up to 2 wounds and place an equal number of wound tokens on this card instead. If you do, at the end of your activation, discard each token on this card and suffer wounds equal to the number of tokens discarded.

keywords.name: You gain Scout 1
keywords.description: After you deploy, you may perform a speed-1 move.

Gear.name: Electro Grappling Line
Gear.description: [Action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 2 immobilize tokens and 2 suppression tokens.

Gear.name: Personal Combat Shield
Gear.description: You gain Shielded 1 (You have 1 shield token.) and Recharge 1 (When you recover flip 1 inactive shield token.)

Gear.name: Electrobinoculars
Gear.description:
You gain [Card Action] Spotter 1 (Choose 1 friendly unit at range 1. That unit gains 1 aim token.)

B1 Battle Droids can ignore this card's Gear upgrade icon requirement.

keywords.name: Spotter 1
keywords.description: Choose 1 friendly unit at range 1. That unit gains 1 aim token.

Generator.name: Barrage Generator
Generator.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 2 white attack dice and apply SUPPRESSIVE to your attack pool.

Generator.name: Overcharged Generator
Generator.description: While performing a ranged attack with a weapon that has FIXED, add 1 black attack die and apply IMPACT 1 to your attack pool.

keywords.description: Ignore cover.

keywords.name: Impact 1
keywords.description: While attacking a unit that has armor, change up to 1 [hit] result to a [crit] result.

keywords.description: While attacking a unit that has armor, change up to 1 [hit] result to a [crit] result.

Pilot.name: Wedge Antilles

You gain "[Surge Attack]: [Hit]"

commandCards.name: Standing Orders
commandCards.description: At the end of the Command Phase, return this card to your hand.

commandCards.name: Son of Skywalker
commandCards.description: When Luke performs his first attack he may make an additional attack.

commandCards.name: My Ally is the Force
commandCards.description: When a friendly trooper unit is activated it gains a dodge token.

commandCards.name: Return of the Jedi
commandCards.description: When Luke Skywalker is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Luke Skywalker activates, each friendly trooper at range 1-3 of him may remove 1 suppression token.

commandCards.name: Implacable
commandCards.description: At the end of Darth Vader's first activation, he may suffer 1 wound to shuffle his order token into the order pool. During Darth Vader's second activation, he performs 1 fewer action.

commandCards.name: New Ways to Motivate Them
commandCards.description: When a friendly non-Darth Vader trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, it may suffer 1 wound to perform 1 free action.

commandCards.name: Master of Evil
commandCards.description: When Darth Vader is issued an order, he gains 1 dodge token. When Darth Vader activates, each enemy trooper at range 1-2 of him gains 3 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Maximum Firepower
commandCards.description: At the end of General Veers´ activation, he may perform an attack using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: Evasive Maneuvers
commandCards.description: When a friendly vehicle unit is issued an order it gains 1 dodge token. Friendly vehicle units can spend dodge tokens to cancel critical hit results.

commandCards.name: Imperial Discipline
commandCards.description: When a friendly unit is issued an order it may recover.

commandCards.name: Coordinated Bombardment
commandCards.description: At the end of Leia Organa's activation, you may perform up to 3 attacks against different enemy units using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: No Time for Sorrows
commandCards.description: When a friendly Trooper unit is issued an order, it may perform a speed-1 move.

commandCards.name: Somebody Has to Save Our Skins
commandCards.description: After Leia Organa's activation, you may choose a friendly unit at range 1-2 with a faceup order token and activate it.

commandCards.name: Sorry About the Mess
commandCards.description: While building a command hand, treat this card as though it has 1 pip. When Han Solo is issued an order, he gains 1 aim token and 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Reckless Diversion
commandCards.description: When an enemy unit performs an attack, it must attack a trooper unit that has a faceup order token, if available.

commandCards.name: Change of Plans
commandCards.description: When this card is revealed, you may discard it to return an opponents command card to their hand. If you do, return to the Select Command Card step. That opponent cannot select the command card that was returned to their hand.

commandCards.name: And Now... You Will Die
commandCards.description: During Emperor Palpatine's activation, he may suffer 1 wound and gain 1 suppression token to perform an attack. He may do this any number of times. After Emperor Palpatine performs an attack, the defender gains 1 immobilized token.

commandCards.name: Give in to Your Anger
commandCards.description: Before an opponent would activate their first unit, you may choose an enemy trooper unit. If you do, your opponent must activate that unit instead. Assign it an order token from its order pool unless it has a faceup order token. At the end of that unit's activation, if it did not perform an attack, it gains 4 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Whipcord Launcher
commandCards.description: Boba Fett can perform moves while engaged with a unit that has 1 or more immobilized tokens. During Boba Fett's activation he gains: [card action] Choose an enemy trooper unit at range 1 and in line of sight. It gains 2 immobilized tokens and 2 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: ZX Flame Projector
commandCards.description: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapons:

commandCards.name: Z-6 Jetpack Rocket
commandCards.description: During Boba Fett's activation he gains the following weapons:

commandCards.name: Common Cause
commandCards.description: After Chewbacca activates, if Luke Skywalker has a faceup order token, he may activate. After Luke Skywalker activates, if Chewbacca has a faceup order token, he may activate.

commandCards.name: Brains and Brawn
commandCards.description: While Leia Organa is performing a ranged attack, if Chewbacca is not engaged and has line of sight to and is at range 1-3 of the defender, add one of his ranged weapons to the attack pool.

commandCards.name: Notorious Scoundrels
commandCards.description: Choose one of Han Solo's command cards in your discard pile. Return that card to your hand.

commandCards.name: Sabotaged Communications
commandCards.description: Your opponent must issue orders to 1 fewer unit than is indicated on their command card to a minimum of 1.

commandCards.name: Turning the Tide
commandCards.description: Each friendly support or heavy unit gains Inspire 2.

commandCards.name: Covering Fire
commandCards.description: After a friendly corps unit performs a ranged attack, another friendly unit at range 1-2 may gain 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Covert Observation
commandCards.description: Look at up to 2 random command cards from an opponent's hand.

commandCards.name: Coordinated Fire
commandCards.description: After a friendly corps unit performs a ranged attack, if it spent 1 or more aim tokens, another friendly unit at range 1–2 may gain 1 aim token.

commandCards.name: Rebellious
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Charge. Once per round, when an enemy unit at range 1-2 and in line of sight of Jyn Erso activates, before it performs its Rally step, Jyn Erso may gain 1 suppression token to either perform an attack against that unit or to perform a free move action.

commandCards.name: Trust Goes Both Ways
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Inspire 2. When Jyn Erso issues an order to another friendly trooper unit, that unit gains Teamwork: Jyn Erso.

commandCards.name: Complete the Mission
commandCards.description: Jyn Erso gains Low Profile. When a friendly trooper unit is issued an order, it may gain 1 suppression token. When a friendly trooper unit with a faceup order token activates, during its activation, it cannot become panicked or suppressed. At the end of that unit's activation, it may remove 1 suppression token.

commandCards.name: Voracious Ambition
commandCards.description: At the start of the Activation Phase place 3 random order tokens from your order pool face down on this card. You may look at these order tokens at any time. When you would draw an order token from your order pool, you may choose 1 order token on this card and use that order token instead.

commandCards.name: Deploy the Garrison
commandCards.description: At the start of the Activation Phase, choose up to 2 friendly trooper units that have faceup order tokens. Each chosen unit may perform a free standby action.

commandCards.name: Annihilation Looms
commandCards.description: Each trooper unit gains 1 suppression token. If it is round 5 or 6, each trooper unit gains 1 additional suppression token.

commandCards.name: Explosions!
commandCards.description: During the round this card is played Sabine Wren gains →Arm 2: Thermal Charge. After she performs this action, she may perform a speed-1 move. Until the end of the game Sabine Wren gains Detonate 2: Thermal Charge. Do not discard this card from play.

commandCards.name: Symbol of Rebellion
commandCards.description: When Sabine Wren activates she recovers. During Sabine Wren's activation, you may place 1 grafiti token at range 1 and in line of sight of her, touching a piece of non-area terrain.

commandCards.name: Legacy of Mandalore
commandCards.description: Sabine Wren gains Inspire 1. When Sabine Wren issues an order to a Commander, Operative, or Special Forces unit, she gains either 1 aim token or 1 dodge token.

commandCards.name: Merciless Munitions
commandCards.description:
During the round this card is played Bossk gains →Arm 1: Dioxis Charge. After he performs this action, he may perform a speed-1 move. Until the end of the game Bossk gains Detonate 1: Dioxis Charge.

After a trooper unit defends against an attack made by your dioxis charge, it gains 1 poison token.Do not discard this card from play.

commandCards.name: Reptillian Rampage
commandCards.description: During Bossk's activation he can perform up to 2 attack actions and he may suffer 1 wound to perform a free move action.

commandCards.name: Lying in Wait
commandCards.description: Bossk gains Sharpshooter 1. After an enemy unit activates, Bossk gains 1 aim token.

commandCards.name: Trained in Your Jedi Arts
commandCards.description: General Grievous gains Disengage and 1 dodge token. At the end of his activation he may perform an attack against each enemy unit at range 1 using the following weapon:

commandCards.name: Supreme Commander
commandCards.description: General Grievous gains 1 surge token for each friendly trooper unit at range 1. While another friendly trooper unit has a faceup order token, it gains Guardian 2 and can use Guardian during a melee attack.

commandCards.name: Crush Them!
commandCards.description: When General Grievous issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 surge token for each defeated enemy unit.

commandCards.name: Hello There
commandCards.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi gains Nimble. At the start of the Activation Phase, Obi-Wan Kenobi gains 1 aim, 1 dodge, 1 standby, or 1 surge token for each enemy unit at range 1-2.

commandCards.name: Knowledge and Defense
commandCards.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi gains 1 dodge token for each other friendly trooper unit at range 1. Obi-Wan Kenobi can use Guardian during a melee attack.

commandCards.name: General Kenobi
commandCards.description: When Obi-Wan Kenobi issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 surge token for each other friendly unit at range 1 of it.

commandCards.name: Fear, Surprise, Intimidation
commandCards.description: Count Dooku gains Arsenal 2 and Relentless, and each of his ranged weapons gains Versatile. After he performs an attack, each defender gains 2 suppression tokens.

commandCards.name: Double the Fall
commandCards.description: At the start of Activation phase, if Count Dooku has a faceup order token, he may return it to his order pool to choose up to 2 enemy units at range 1-2 and return their order tokens to their order pool.

commandCards.name: You Disappoint Me
commandCards.description: When Count Dooku issues an order to a unit, that unit gains 1 dodge token. After Count Dooku performs a ranged attack against a trooper unit, he may perform a speed-2 move with that unit.

commandCards.name: You Can Call Me Captain
commandCards.descriptions: Captain Rex gains Fire Support. When using Fire Support, his order token is not flipped upside down. When a friendly unit attacks in melee, Rex can use Fire Support to add a ranged weapon to that attack.

commandCards.name: Eat this, Clankers!
commandCards.descriptions: When a friendly trooper unit performs a ranged attack while having a faceup order token and an Aim token, during the "gather a attack dice pool" step that unit can increase the maximum range of every weapon by 1 (to a maximum of 4).

commandCards.name: We're Not Programmed
commandCards.descriptions: Clone Captain Rex gains Inspire 2 and 2 surge tokens. When Clone Captain Rex activates, he recovers.

sources.name: TX-225 GAVw Occupier Combat Assault Tank Unit
